item.description:
We're meeting at Jan & Susan's house this month so we can do a phone tree afterward. Come and hear what the club is planning! The board members who can answer any questions you may have will be here. All members and prospective members are encouraged to attend.

By actively participating in planning upcoming events, the more fun you'll be generating in upcoming weeks & months.

BYOB and sandwiches, salads, etc. to share. Please RSVP by Oct. 3 so Jan knows how much to cook.
item.name: BBTC Business Meeting
